name: tasteology
description: A vanilla HTML/CSS/JS implementation of a design mockup featuring a Gallery Block and Cards Block. This project demonstrates production-quality frontend development skills without relying on frameworks or utility libraries.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.lint:a11y: npm run preview & npx axe http://localhost:4173 --exit
scripts.lighthouse: npm run build && npm run preview & npm run lighthouse:run
scripts.lighthouse:mobile: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --preset=perf --form-factor=mobile --screenEmulation.disabled --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-mobile.html && pkill -f "vite preview"
scripts.lighthouse:desktop: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --preset=perf --form-factor=desktop --screenEmulation.disabled --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-desktop.html && pkill -f "vite preview"
scripts.lighthouse:both: npm run lighthouse:mobile && npm run lighthouse:desktop
scripts.lighthouse:100: npm run build && npm run preview & sleep 3 && node lighthouse-config.js && pkill -f "vite preview"
